quotes.saying: Happiness is not something you postpone for the future; it is something you design for the present.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.saying: Take care of your body. It's the only place you have to live.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.saying: Discipline is the bridge between goals and accomplishment.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.saying: If you don't like how things are, change it! You're not a tree.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.saying: Affirmation without discipline is the beginning of delusion.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.saying: If you are not willing to risk the unusual, you will have to settle for the ordinary.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.saying: If you really want to do something, you'll find a way. If you don't, you'll find an excuse.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn
